resources.string: Enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format
How to use Covid Tracker App

Start off by typing a date in the search bar below with the following YYYY-MM-DD format, you will then get provided with a returned list of covid cases after the given date. You can then view the information and click the "Heart" shaped button to save info to the favourites list, to remove a date from the favourites list you will then have to click on the red "Heart" shape again to automatically remove the following date. The navigation pane will give you a few options to either go to the following listed apps and or get the information on how to use my covid-19 app.
Covid 19 information tracker, Mohamed Sadek, Version 1
